revised_title: Advanced Techniques for Estimating Parameters of Multi-Mode Rotor-Bearing Systems
tldr: This paper presents a frequency-domain approach to estimate the linearized bearing coefficients of multi-mode rotor-bearing systems. The technique can be used with complex rotor models supported by an arbitrary number of bearings and can also estimate the lumped spring stiffness coefficients without additional measurements. The method overcomes limitations of previous techniques and offers versatility in various applications.
